detail_desc: Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, small opening and button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves.
Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck opening at the front and frilled collar with sewn-in ties. Buttons at the top and short butterfly sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
A pair of twisted metal hoop earrings. The zinc content is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Metal hair clips decorated with sparkly stones. Length 8.5 cm.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Large metal plate earrings. Length 7 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a looser fit with tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fabric scrunchies with a shimmering pattern and decorative bow.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with deep armholes.
Joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and a fake fly. Tapered legs with narrow elastication at the hems.
Fancy dress wig made from coloured synthetic hair. Textile lining with an elasticated edge.
Bracelets in various designs. Two elasticated with wooden and metal beads and two with waxed cords.

Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar decorated with sequins and sparkly plastic beads, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, and short slits in the sides.
Bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a double pocket on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Crop tops in cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and patch front pockets. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Cap with an appliqué on the front and concealed elastication at the back.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with smocking at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cap in cotton twill with glittery, embroidered appliqués on the front and at the top and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fitted jumper in fine, rib-knit merino wool with long sleeves.
Block-heeled ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in fabric made from recycled polyester. Heel 6 cm.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Front in contrasting chenille yarn.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small, sturdy handbag in imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and a detachable metal chain shoulder strap. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 9x13x17.5 cm.
Twill trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication and a button at the waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Comfort blanket in an airy cotton weave with a padded head. Size 33x33 cm. Rattle in a soft knit in the shape of a teddy bear. Polyester padding. Width approx. 9 cm. Length approx. 13 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in a soft, organic cotton fine knit with adjustable straps that fasten at the front and ribbed hems.
Relaxed-fit vest top in a soft knit with a V-neck front and back and a ribbed hem.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose twill weave with a high, elasticated drawstring wast and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets with a decorative flap and button, and tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless jersey top in a linen blend with a round neck and pleated lace frill at the shoulders. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cotton rib knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a striped weave made from a linen blend containing some Tencel™ lyocell with an elasticated waist, discreet side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Earrings with metal rings and fabric tassels at the ends. Length 5.5 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fitted, round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Knee-length skirt in airy chiffon with a high, elasticated, ribbed waistband. Lined.
Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with a concealed elastic gore at the front. Toe caps and soles in thermoplastic rubber (TPR).
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in patterned satin. Double-breasted shirt with a shawl collar. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy, textured jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neck, seam and flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.
Cardigan in soft, purl-knit cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Knee-length dress in a stretch weave with a cut-out V-neck, cap sleeves, concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low waist and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt jacket in a soft weave containing some wool with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester and wool content of the shirt jacket is recycled.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny, tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long dress in a crisp, patterned organic cotton weave with a V-neck opening at the top, stand-up collar with narrow ties and long raglan balloon sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Decorative seam under the bust and inset panels at the sides with gathers and a small frill trim to create added volume in the skirt. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long, wide jumper in fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.
Fully lined bikini top. Triangular cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back. No fasteners.

Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a flock print, jersey-lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks.
